description.textDescription: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.
description.advancedDescription: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).

description.textDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description.advancedDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

description.textDescription: A stone shard with immense power.
description.advancedDescription: A stone shard with immense power.

description.textDescription: Killing an enemy gives you a burst of movement speed.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.
description.advancedDescription: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

description.textDescription: Seems to do nothing... but...
description.advancedDescription: Seems to do nothing... but...

description.textDescription: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.
description.advancedDescription: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

description.textDescription: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

description.textDescription: Your 'Critical Strikes' deal an additional 100% damage.
description.advancedDescription: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).

description.textDescription: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.
description.advancedDescription: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

description.textDescription: Double the strength of healing.
description.advancedDescription: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

description.textDescription: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.
description.advancedDescription: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

description.textDescription: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

description.textDescription: Gain an extra jump.
description.advancedDescription: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

description.textDescription: Reduce incoming damage while sprinting.
description.advancedDescription: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

description.textDescription: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.
description.advancedDescription: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

description.textDescription: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.
description.advancedDescription: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

description.textDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description.advancedDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

description.textDescription: Increase sprint speed by +25%.
description.advancedDescription: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

description.textDescription: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.
description.advancedDescription: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

description.textDescription: Reduces cooldowns for your skills.
description.advancedDescription: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

description.textDescription: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
description.advancedDescription: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

description.textDescription: Chance to fire a missile.
description.advancedDescription: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

description.textDescription: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.
description.advancedDescription: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

description.textDescription: Activating your Equipment triggers an additional, random Equipment effect.
description.advancedDescription: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

description.textDescription: Receive flat healing when attacked.
description.advancedDescription: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

description.textDescription: Gain gold on hit... BUT surrender gold on getting hit.
description.advancedDescription: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

description.textDescription: Replace your Special Skill with 'Ruin'.
description.advancedDescription: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: 'Critical Strikes' heal you.
description.advancedDescription: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

description.textDescription: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.
description.advancedDescription: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

description.textDescription: Killing an enemy ignites other nearby enemies.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

description.textDescription: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.
description.advancedDescription: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

description.textDescription: Increase your maximum health.
description.advancedDescription: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

description.textDescription: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.
description.advancedDescription: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

description.textDescription: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... BUT reduce the size of the zone.
description.advancedDescription: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

description.textDescription: Enter a frenzy after killing 4 enemies in quick succession.
description.advancedDescription: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

description.textDescription: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.
description.advancedDescription: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

description.textDescription: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.
description.advancedDescription: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

description.textDescription: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.
description.advancedDescription: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

description.textDescription: Fire tracking wisps while sprinting.
description.advancedDescription: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

description.textDescription: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.
description.advancedDescription: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

description.textDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description.advancedDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

description.textDescription: Dealing damage heals you.
description.advancedDescription: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

description.textDescription: Turn invisible at low health.
description.advancedDescription: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

description.textDescription: Increase movement speed.
description.advancedDescription: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

description.textDescription: ...and his music was electric.
description.advancedDescription: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

description.textDescription: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.
description.advancedDescription: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

description.textDescription: Deal extra damage to bosses.
description.advancedDescription: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

description.textDescription: Chance on kill to summon an Ancestral Pod.
description.advancedDescription: 7% chance (+1% per stack) on kill to summon an Ancestral Pod that distracts enemies.Once it fully grows, it will hatch into an allied Parent with 100% health (+100% per stack).

description.textDescription: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.
description.advancedDescription: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

description.textDescription: Deal bonus damage. Breaks at low health.
description.advancedDescription: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

description.textDescription: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.
description.advancedDescription: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

description.textDescription: Slow enemies on hit.
description.advancedDescription: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

description.textDescription: Summon an Alpha Construct on killing an elite.
description.advancedDescription: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).

description.textDescription: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
description.advancedDescription: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

description.textDescription: Boosts health and regeneration.
description.advancedDescription: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

description.textDescription: Chance to repeatedly strike a single enemy with lightning. Corrupts all Ukuleles.
description.advancedDescription: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

description.textDescription: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.
description.advancedDescription: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

description.textDescription: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.
description.advancedDescription: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

description.textDescription: Gain 25 max health.
description.advancedDescription: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

description.textDescription: Increase ALL of your stats.
description.advancedDescription: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

description.textDescription: Slightly increase attack speed and movement speed.
description.advancedDescription: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

description.textDescription: Recruit a Beetle Guard.
description.advancedDescription: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

description.textDescription: Chance to root enemies on hit. Corrupts all Chronobaubles.
description.advancedDescription: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

description.textDescription: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.
description.advancedDescription: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

description.textDescription: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.
description.advancedDescription: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

description.textDescription: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.
description.advancedDescription: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

description.textDescription: Gain a recharging shield.
description.advancedDescription: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

description.textDescription: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.
description.advancedDescription: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

description.textDescription: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.
description.advancedDescription: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

description.textDescription: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.
description.advancedDescription: Replace your Secondary Skill  with Slicing Maelstrom.Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: Items and equipment have a small chance to transform into a Lunar item instead.
description.advancedDescription: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

description.textDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
description.advancedDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

description.textDescription: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.
description.advancedDescription: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

description.textDescription: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.
description.advancedDescription: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

description.textDescription: Chance to collapse enemies on hit. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.
description.advancedDescription: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

description.textDescription: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

description.textDescription: Permanently reduce armor on hit.
description.advancedDescription: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

description.textDescription: Cheat death. Consumed on use.
description.advancedDescription: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

description.textDescription: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.
description.advancedDescription: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

description.textDescription: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.
description.advancedDescription: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

description.textDescription: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.
description.advancedDescription: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: Heal while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.
description.advancedDescription: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

description.textDescription: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.
description.advancedDescription: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

description.textDescription: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.
description.advancedDescription: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

description.textDescription: Increase attack speed.
description.advancedDescription: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

description.textDescription: Rapidly heal outside of danger.
description.advancedDescription: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

description.textDescription: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.
description.advancedDescription: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

description.textDescription: Full health enemies also detonate on hit. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.
description.advancedDescription: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

description.textDescription: Drop a healing orb on kill.
description.advancedDescription: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

description.textDescription: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.
description.advancedDescription: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

description.textDescription: Fire haunting skulls when healed.
description.advancedDescription: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

description.textDescription: Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. Usable once per stage.
description.advancedDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

description.textDescription: Gain +10% chance to bleed enemies on hit.
description.advancedDescription: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

description.textDescription: Receive an instant heal at low health. Consumed on use.
description.advancedDescription: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

description.textDescription: Detonate enemies on kill.
description.advancedDescription: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

description.textDescription: Plant a healing fruit on kill.
description.advancedDescription: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

description.textDescription: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.
description.advancedDescription: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

description.textDescription: Replace your Utility Skill with 'Shadowfade'.
description.advancedDescription: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: All your attacks explode!
description.advancedDescription: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

description.textDescription: Gain gold on taking damage.
description.advancedDescription: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

description.textDescription: Gain 10% chance for hits to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
description.advancedDescription: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

description.textDescription: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.
description.advancedDescription: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

description.textDescription: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.
description.advancedDescription: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.

description.textDescription: Block the next source of damage. Corrupts all Tougher Times.
description.advancedDescription: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.

description.textDescription: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.
description.advancedDescription: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

description.textDescription: Reduce damage the first time you are hit.
description.advancedDescription: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

description.textDescription: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
description.advancedDescription: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

description.textDescription: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.
description.advancedDescription: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

description.textDescription: Gain multiple orbiting bombs. Every minute, assimilate another item into Egocentrism.
description.advancedDescription: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

description.textDescription: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.
description.advancedDescription: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

description.textDescription: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.
description.advancedDescription: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: Add an extra charge of your Special skill. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.
description.advancedDescription: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

description.textDescription: All Missile items deal more damage and fire an additional two missiles.
description.advancedDescription: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)

description.textDescription: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds. You are unlucky.
description.advancedDescription: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

description.textDescription: Get a delivery each stage that contains powerful items.
description.advancedDescription: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).

description.textDescription: Chance to block incoming damage.
description.advancedDescription: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

description.textDescription: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.
description.advancedDescription: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

description.textDescription: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken. Recharges over time.
description.advancedDescription: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

description.textDescription: Gain a 0.5% chance to instantly kill a non-boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.
description.advancedDescription: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

description.textDescription: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.
description.advancedDescription: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

description.textDescription: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.
description.advancedDescription: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

description.textDescription: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.
description.advancedDescription: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

description.textDescription: Upgrades your items at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.
description.advancedDescription: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

description.textDescription: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.
description.advancedDescription: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

description.textDescription: While you have shield, fire missiles on every hit. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.
description.advancedDescription: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

description.textDescription: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.
description.advancedDescription: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

description.textDescription: Kills reduce equipment cooldown.
description.advancedDescription: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

description.textDescription: Fire an electric nova at low health.
description.advancedDescription: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

description.textDescription: Chance to stun on hit.
description.advancedDescription: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

description.textDescription: Luck is on your side.
description.advancedDescription: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

description.textDescription: Move fast out of combat.
description.advancedDescription: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

description.textDescription: Prevent debuffs, instead gaining a temporary barrier. Recharges over time.
description.advancedDescription: Prevents 1 (+1 per stack) debuff and instead grants a temporary barrier for 10% of maximum health. Recharges every 5 seconds.

description.textDescription: Halve your cooldowns.. BUT halve your attack speed.
description.advancedDescription: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

description.textDescription: Double your health... BUT halve your speed.
description.advancedDescription: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

description.textDescription: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.
description.advancedDescription: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

description.textDescription: Periodically recruit allies from the Void. Corrupts all yellow items.
description.advancedDescription: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

description.textDescription: Get a corrupted extra life. Consumed on use. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.
description.advancedDescription: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

description.textDescription: Your ignite effects deal quadruple damage.
description.advancedDescription: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.
